price: Kuni beekumsa irraa waan Gooftaan kee gara keetti wahyii godheedha. Rabbii wajjin gabbaramaa biraa hin taasisin. (Yoos)  jahannam keessatti darbamta komatamaa fageeffamaa taatee.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِمَّآ أَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۗ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتُلۡقَىٰ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَلُومٗا مَّدۡحُورًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhālika mimmā awḥā ilayka rabbuka mina al-ḥik'mati walā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatul'qā fī jahannama malūman madḥūran
